CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 14, 1955, pg. 15, reads: "Voluntary Manslaughter Sentence - Thomas Brown, of 1302 Pasture Way, is shown leaving court after a kiss from his wife under the watchful eye of a deputy sheriff. Brown was sentenced to from two to four years for voluntary manslaughter in his Dec. 26 slaying of John J. Saunders Jr., of 1026 Gibbon Street. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Thomas Brown handcuffed to deputy sheriff, leaving courtroom after sentencing of voluntary manslaughter of John J. Saunders Jr.
